meanings.definition: The quality or state of being obnoxious.
meanings.sent1: Her obnoxiousness made it hard to enjoy the party.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the obnoxiousness of his loud music.
meanings.sent3: Despite her obnoxiousness, we still invited her to the gathering.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxiousness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over us.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxiousness of his behavior left a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being extremely unpleasant or offensive.
meanings.sent1: The obnoxiousness of the smell was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: His jokes crossed the line into obnoxiousness.
meanings.sent3: The obnoxiousness of the situation was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxiousness of the graffiti on the wall was a blight on the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxiousness of the noise made it impossible to concentrate.

meanings.sent1: His obnoxiousness at the meeting irritated everyone.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't tolerate his constant obnoxiousness.
meanings.sent3: Despite his obnoxiousness, he somehow managed to make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxiousness of his actions was like nails on a chalkboard.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxiousness of their bickering filled the room with tension.
